author: dependabot-preview[bot]
body:
Bumps [Markdig.Signed](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig) from 0.15.7 to 0.16.0.
Changelog *Sourced from [Markdig.Signed's changelog](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/blob/master/changelog.md).* > ## 0.16.0 (25 Feb 2019) > - Improve performance of emoji-abbreviation parser ([(PR [#305](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/305))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/305)) > - Change output for math extension to use a rendering more compatible with existing Math JS libraries ([(PR [#311](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/311))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/311)) > - Improve emphasis parser to allow to match more than 2 characters ([(PR [#301](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/301))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/301)) > - Output attached attributes to a `` from a table row ([(PR [#300](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/300))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/300)) > - Improve MarkdownObject.Descendants() search ([(PR [#288](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/288))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/288)) > - Allow to pass a `MarkdownParserContext` ([(PR [#285](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/285))](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/pull/285)) >
Commits - [`6dcef43`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/6dcef438c4ef716392cfc80cb112ed2dd308e959) Bump to 0.16.0 - [`40206c4`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/40206c4d764a17b0146307481006002e446a0e74) Merge pull request [#311](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/311) from RickStrahl/MathExtension_Bracketing - [`24ecfc9`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/24ecfc93f34cd4a235d61a216edd75340e9bb7e2) Merge pull request [#310](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/310) from MihaZupan/master - [`8eb52c5`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/8eb52c50ecfc9c8e4497227ded96675f50ac526d) Update Math Specs and ensure tests pass. - [`9965597`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/99655972561271af39834699759a9717d39d1717) Fix tests to match bracketing. - [`987580e`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/987580e71ebbfa474bb490b3a984b1ee906f0e7d) Add inline block and block display bracketing tags around rendered mathematic... - [`bba3ef0`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/bba3ef04eed302922ebc158d27567091664041e2) Improve CompactPrefixTree's memory footprint - [`d8a594a`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/d8a594a151126808dc2255f51b5f9d5f1a398fdb) Merge pull request [#309](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/309) from yishengjin1413/master - [`60c64b6`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/60c64b67c77d3334e83f6fe36c755d996d117efa) remove lazy initialize - [`7f0b39a`](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/commit/7f0b39a44a8a33536a40431f75919bacb044f4fb) Merge pull request [#308](https://github-redirect.dependabot.com/lunet-io/markdig/issues/308) from yishengjin1413/master - Additional commits viewable in [compare view](https://github.com/lunet-io/markdig/compare/v0.15.7...v0.16.0)

[![Dependabot compatibility score](https://api.dependabot.com/badges/compatibility_score?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.15.7&new-version=0.16.0)](https://dependabot.com/compatibility-score.html?dependency-name=Markdig.Signed&package-manager=nuget&previous-version=0.15.7&new-version=0.16.0) Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`. [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-start) [//]: # (dependabot-automerge-end) ---
Dependabot commands and options
You can trigger Dependabot actions by commenting on this PR: - `@dependabot rebase` will rebase this PR - `@dependabot recreate` will recreate this PR, overwriting any edits that have been made to it - `@dependabot merge` will merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot squash and merge` will squash and merge this PR after your CI passes on it - `@dependabot cancel merge` will cancel a previously requested merge - `@dependabot reopen` will reopen this PR if it is closed - `@dependabot ignore this [patch|minor|major] version` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this minor/major version (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot ignore this dependency` will close this PR and stop Dependabot creating any more for this dependency (unless you reopen the PR or upgrade to it yourself) - `@dependabot use these labels` will set the current labels as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these reviewers` will set the current reviewers as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use these assignees` will set the current assignees as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot use this milestone` will set the current milestone as the default for future PRs for this repo and language - `@dependabot badge me` will comment on this PR with code to add a "Dependabot enabled" badge to your readme Additionally, you can set the following in your Dependabot [dashboard](https://app.dependabot.com): - Update frequency (including time of day and day of week) - Automerge options (never/patch/minor, and dev/runtime dependencies) - Pull request limits (per update run and/or open at any time) - Out-of-range updates (receive only lockfile updates, if desired) - Security updates (receive only security updates, if desired) Finally, you can contact us by mentioning @dependabot.

comments.body: @iSazonov Thanks for pointing out, I have pushed a fix to replace usage of the obsolete field.

title: Build(deps): Bump Markdig.Signed from 0.15.7 to 0.16.0
